headline: Petro-Victory Energy provides update on the conclusion of drilling the AND-5 well in the 100% owned Andorinha field, onshore, Brasil
summary: Petro-Victory Energy Corp. (TSXV: VRY) ("Petro-Victory" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that the drilling operations for the AND-5 well, in partnership with Azevedo & Travassos Energia ("ATE"), located in the Andorinha Field, Potiguar Basin, Rio Grande do Norte, were successfully concluded.

headline: Weatherford International: Upside From Oil And Gas, But Look At Peers
summary: Weatherford's global reach, cash strength, and post-bankruptcy strategy signal growth potential despite challenges. See more on WFRD stock here.
